Symbol.Script_1D:
dim show_zone_type_arr[13] show_zone_type_arr[1]= "Номер в круге" show_zone_type_arr[2]= "Название" show_zone_type_arr[3]= "Только площадь" show_zone_type_arr[4]= "Название, номер и площадь" show_zone_type_arr[5]= "Номер и тип отделки стен" show_zone_type_arr[6]= "Воздухообмен" show_zone_type_arr[7]= "Номер в круге и площадь" show_zone_type_arr[8]= "Номер и кол-во человек" show_zone_type_arr[9]= "Категория зоны" show_zone_type_arr[10]= "Категория пож." show_zone_type_arr[11]= "Тип отделки" show_zone_type_arr[12]= "Данные БТИ" show_zone_type_arr[13]= "Вывод свойств"
dim show_zone_num_arr[5] show_zone_num_arr[1] = "AC-1" show_zone_num_arr[2] = "AC-2" show_zone_num_arr[3] = "ОВ-1" show_zone_num_arr[4] = "ОВ-2" show_zone_num_arr[5] = "ПТ-1"
dim nazn_arr[] : i=0 i=i+1 : nazn_arr[i] = "АС" i=i+1 : nazn_arr[i] ="ОВ" i=i+1 : nazn_arr[i] ="ВК" i=i+1 : nazn_arr[i] ="ТХ" i=i+1 : nazn_arr[i] ="ЭЛ" i=i+1 : nazn_arr[i] ="ЭМ" i=i+1 : nazn_arr[i] ="ТС" i=i+1 : nazn_arr[i] ="Дверь" i=i+1 : nazn_arr[i] ="Окно" nazn = nazn_arr
Symbol.Script_UI:
ui_dialog `Kuvbur_АС Общие параметры`, 550, 410 ui_separator 280, 0, 280, 410 sx = 5 sy = 0 sxe = 180
sy = sy + 5:
UI_OUTFIELD `Операторы`, sx+20, sy, 70, 20 UI_INFIELD "show_op_otv", sx, sy-3, 15, 20
UI_OUTFIELD `Отверстия`, sx+20+100, sy, 60, 20 UI_INFIELD "show_asotv", sx+100, sy-3, 15, 20
UI_INFIELD "pen_eq", sx+150+40, sy-3, 15, 20 UI_INFIELD "pen_all", sx+180+40, sy-3, 40, 20
if show_asotv then sy = sy + 25 dx = 10 if pen_eq=0 then for i=1 to vardim1(nazn_arr) UI_OUTFIELD nazn_arr[i], dx, sy, 25,15 UI_INFIELD{3} pen_nazn[i], dx-5, sy+18, 28, 20 dx = dx + 30 next i endif sy = sy + 20 sy = sy + 20: UI_OUTFIELD `Показ зоны сбора воды в приямок`, sx+25, sy, sx+200, 20 UI_INFIELD "show_razukl", sx, sy-3, 20, 20
sy = sy + 20: UI_OUTFIELD `Показ условных стен приямка`, sx+25, sy, sx+180, 20 UI_INFIELD "show_th", sx, sy-3, 20, 20
sy = sy + 20: UI_OUTFIELD `Не отображать отверстия, если`, sx+40, sy, sxe, 20
sy = sy + 20: UI_OUTFIELD `Высота менее, мм.`, sx, sy, sx+120, 20 UI_INFIELD "min_h_otv", sx+130, sy-3, 50, 20
sy = sy + 20: UI_OUTFIELD `Ширина менее, мм.`, sx, sy, sx+120, 20 UI_INFIELD "min_b_otv", sx+130, sy-3, 50, 20 endif
sy = sy + 20: UI_OUTFIELD `Отображение окон, дверей`, sx+50, sy, sxe, 20
sy = sy + 18: UI_OUTFIELD `Только проём двери`, sx+20, sy, 110, 20 UI_INFIELD "show_empty_door", sx, sy-3, 20, 20
UI_OUTFIELD `Только проём окна`, sx+120+40, sy, 110, 20 UI_INFIELD "show_empty_wind", sx+120+20, sy-3, 20, 20
sy = sy + 25: UI_OUTFIELD `Отображать л. стены дверей`, sx, sy, sx+150, 20 UI_INFIELD "show_wallline_door", sx+160, sy-3, 110, 20
sy = sy + 25: UI_OUTFIELD `Отображать л. стены окон`, sx, sy, sx+150, 20 UI_INFIELD "show_wallline_wind", sx+160, sy-3, 110, 20
sy = sy + 25: UI_OUTFIELD `Тип л. дверей`, sx, sy, sx+70, 20 UI_INFIELD "wallline_door_type", sx+80, sy-3, 165, 20 UI_INFIELD "wallline_door_type_su", sx+80+165+10, sy-3, 20, 20 sy = sy + 25: UI_INFIELD "wallline_door_diag_type", sx+80, sy-3, 165, 20
sy = sy + 25: UI_OUTFIELD `Тип л. окон`, sx, sy, sx+70, 20 UI_INFIELD "wallline_wind_type", sx+80, sy-3, 165, 20 UI_INFIELD "wallline_wind_type_su", sx+80+165+10, sy-3, 20, 20 sy = sy + 25: UI_INFIELD "wallline_wind_diag_type", sx+80, sy-3, 165, 20
sy = sy + 25: UI_OUTFIELD `Детализация`, sx, sy, sx+70, 20 UI_INFIELD "gs_detlevel_3D_m", sx+80, sy-3, 165, 20
sy = 250 sx = 290 sy = 0 sy = sy + 5: UI_OUTFIELD `Отображение информации о помещениях`, sx, sy, sx, 18 sy = sy + 20: UI_INFIELD "show_zone_type", sx, sy-3, 180, 20
sy = sy + 25
UI_GROUPBOX "Свойства в паспорте зоны", sx, sy, 250, 160 dim parentPropertiesArray[] n = request ("Properties_Of_Parent", "", parentPropertiesArray)
sy = sy + 23: UI_OUTFIELD `В круге`, sx+23, sy, 45, 16 UI_INFIELD "show_prop_circle", sx+5, sy, 15, 15 _stSelected = "" _stPropID = prop_circle gosub "getPropertyName" ui_custom_popup_infield "prop_circle", sx+105, sy, 140, 20, 1, 3, 1, _stSelected, parentPropertiesArray dy = 28 sy = sy + dy: UI_OUTFIELD `В рамке`, sx+23, sy, 45, 16 UI_INFIELD "show_prop_rect", sx+5, sy, 15, 15 _stSelected = "" _stPropID = prop_rect gosub "getPropertyName" ui_custom_popup_infield "prop_rect", sx+105, sy, 140, 20, 1, 3, 1, _stSelected, parentPropertiesArray
sy = sy + dy: UI_OUTFIELD `Подчёркнут`, sx+23, sy, 65, 16 UI_INFIELD "show_prop_line", sx+5, sy, 15, 15 _stSelected = "" _stPropID = prop_line gosub "getPropertyName" ui_custom_popup_infield "prop_line", sx+105, sy, 140, 20, 1, 3, 1, _stSelected, parentPropertiesArray
sy = sy + dy: UI_OUTFIELD `В треугольнике`, sx+23, sy, 85, 16 UI_INFIELD "show_prop_triang", sx+5, sy, 15, 15 _stSelected = "" _stPropID = prop_triang gosub "getPropertyName" ui_custom_popup_infield "prop_triang", sx+105, sy, 140, 20, 1, 3, 1, _stSelected, parentPropertiesArray
sy = sy + dy: UI_OUTFIELD `Текст`, sx+23, sy, 65, 16 UI_INFIELD "show_prop_text", sx+5, sy, 15, 15 _stSelected = "" _stPropID = prop_text gosub "getPropertyName" ui_custom_popup_infield "prop_text", sx+105, sy, 140, 20, 1, 3, 1, _stSelected, parentPropertiesArray
sy = sy + 30: UI_OUTFIELD `Размещение маркировки`, sx, sy, sx, 18 sy = sy + 20: UI_INFIELD "show_zone_num", sx, sy-3, 180, 20
sy = 250
sy = sy + 22: UI_OUTFIELD `Показывать высотные отметки в 3д`, sx+20, sy, 260, 20 UI_INFIELD "show_3d_leveldim", sx, sy-3, 20, 20
sy = sy + 22: UI_OUTFIELD `Сист. значение неполного показа конст.`, sx+20, sy, 260, 20 UI_INFIELD "mark_type", sx, sy-3, 20, 20 sy = sy + 22: UI_OUTFIELD `Тип неполного показа`, sx+90, sy, 250, 20 UI_INFIELD "mark_num", sx, sy-3, 90, 20
sy = sy + 22: UI_OUTFIELD `Тип устройства проёма дверей/окон`, sx+20, sy, 250, 20 UI_INFIELD "show_renov_winddoor", sx, sy-3, 20, 20 sy = sy + 22: UI_OUTFIELD `Только огнестойкость дверей/окон`, sx+20, sy, 250, 20 UI_INFIELD "show_firest_winddoor", sx, sy-3, 20, 20 sy = sy + 22: UI_OUTFIELD `Только размер прохода в свету дверей`, sx+20, sy, 250, 20 UI_INFIELD "show_egress_winddoor", sx, sy-3, 20, 20
end
"getPropertyName": r = REQUEST ("Property_Name", _stPropID, _typeName, _groupName, _propertyName) if r > 2 then _stSelected = _propertyName else _stSelected = "" endif return
Symbol.Script_VL:
values "show_zone_type" show_zone_type_arr values "show_zone_num" show_zone_num_arr
values{2} "mark_num" 1,"Вся модель",2,"Только ядро",3,"Без отделки"
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "show_zone_type" then inx = 0 for i = 1 to vardim1(show_zone_type_arr) if show_zone_type_arr[i] = show_zone_type then inx = i next i PARAMETERS ishow_zone_type = inx endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "show_zone_num" then inx = 0 for i = 1 to vardim1(show_zone_num_arr) if show_zone_num_arr[i] = show_zone_num then inx = i next i PARAMETERS ishow_zone_num = inx endif
values "show_wallline_door" "Как в элементе", "Вкл для всех", "Откл для всех" values "show_wallline_wind" "Как в элементе", "Вкл для всех", "Откл для всех"
PARAMETERS nazn = nazn if vardim1(pen_nazn)<>vardim1(nazn) then dim emp1[] for i = 1 to vardim1(nazn) emp1[i] = 1 next i PARAMETERS pen_nazn = emp1 endif if pen_eq=0 then LOCK "pen_all"
if mark_type then LOCK "mark_num"
if show_zone_type <> show_zone_type_arr[13] then LOCK "prop_circle", "show_prop_circle", "prop_rect", "show_prop_rect", "prop_line", "show_prop_line", "prop_triang", "show_prop_triang", "prop_text", "show_prop_text" endif if not(show_prop_circle) then LOCK "prop_circle" if not(show_prop_rect) then LOCK "prop_rect" if not(show_prop_line) then LOCK "prop_line" if not(show_prop_triang) then LOCK "prop_triang" if not(show_prop_text) then LOCK "prop_text"
values{2} "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2, `Детальный`, 1, `Простой`, 0, `Откл.`
